cards.title: Drift
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
One target regains 1 HP and deals another target 1 radiant damage.
One player may discard a one-shot. If they do, they may draw 2 cards.

cards.title: Shift Track
setup: At the start of the game, after drawing your cards, place a token on 1 of the 4 spaces of the shift track.
gameplay: When one of your cards instructs you to shift {DriftL} or {DriftR}, move the shift token 1 space in that direction if possible. Only if the token actually moves does it count as {DriftL} or {DriftR}.
While the token is on a {DriftPast} space, activate {DriftPast} effects.
While the token is on a {DriftFuture} space, activate {DriftFuture} effects.

cards.title: Attenuation Field
body: Draw a card.
{DriftPast} Destroy 1 environment card.
{DriftFuture} Destroy 1 ongoing card.

cards.title: Borrowed Time
body: Select {DriftL} or {DriftR}. Shift that direction up to 3 times. X is the number of times you shifted this way.
If you shifted at least {DriftL} this way, X targets regain 2 HP each. If you shifted {DriftR} this way, {Drift} deals X targets 3 radiant damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: The ravages of time,{BR}condensed to an instant.

cards.title: Dance of the Dragons
body: {DriftFuture} {Drift} deals up to 3 targets 2 radiant damage each. Increase damage dealt this way by 1 to targets that entered play since the end of your last turn. Shift {DriftL}.
{DriftPast} Draw a card. {Drift} regains 1 HP shift {DriftRR}

flavorQuotes.text: Yes. I can see where{BR}they're going to be.

cards.title: Destroyer's Adagio
body: {DriftPast} You may play an onoing card from your trash, or one player may play a card now. Shift {DriftR}
{DriftFuture} {Drift} deals 1 target 2 radiant damage/ Shift {DriftLL}

flavorQuotes.text: Mum always says 'You can{BR}be anything.' Well I need you to be what you were.

cards.title: Drift Step
body: Shift {DriftL} or {DriftR}.
If you shifted {DriftL} this way, {Drift} regains 1 HP. If you shifted {DriftR} this way, {Drift} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.
Draw a card. You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: --kind of theme song?{BR}Shouldn't I have some--

cards.title: Future Focus
body: When this card enters play, return all other focus cards to your hand.
When {Drift} is dealt damage, if you have not shifted this turn, you may shift {DriftRRR}. If you shifted {DriftRRR} this way, {Drift} deals 1 target 3 radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I've been to the future{BR}and you weren't in it!

cards.title: Knight's Heritage
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other copies of Knight's Heritage and play up to 2 ongoing cards from your hand.
The first time {Drift} is dealt damage each turn, you may shift {DriftL} or {DriftR}.

cards.title: Imposed Syncronization
body: Draw a card.
{DriftFuture} Select a target. Reduce damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn. Shift {DriftL}.
{DriftPast} Select a target. Increase damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn. Shift {DriftR}.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't need your help to see{BR}the past, Marm. You need mine.

cards.title: Make Every Second Count
body: {DriftPast} Whenever you shift {DriftL}, select a hero target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.
{DriftFuture} Whenever you shift {DriftR}, select a hero target. Increase the next damage dealt by that target by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Hang on, I'm checking{BR}how that would play out.

cards.title: Out Of Sync
body: {DriftPast} Reduce damage dealt to drift by 1.
{DriftFuture} Increase damage dealt by {Drift} to other targets by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Enough with the monsters!{BR}You're taking us home!

cards.title: Past Focus
body: When this card enters play, return all other focus cards to your hand.
When {Drift} is dealt damage, if you have not shifted this turn, you may shift {DriftLLL}. If you shifted {DriftLLL} this way, you may play a card.

cards.title: Resource Daydreamer
body: Draw 2 cards. Discard a card.
{DriftPast} You may play a card.
{DriftFuture} You may use a power.

cards.title: Sabershard
body: Power: {DriftPast} Draw a card. Shift {DriftR}.
Power: {DriftFuture} Drift 1 target 2 radiant damage. Shift {DriftL}.

flavorQuotes.text: Look! I can make swords!{BR}Swords I've had, or will have. Apparently{BR}it's a lot of swords.

cards.title: Throwing Shard
body: Power: {DriftPast} 1 target regains 2 HP. Shift {DriftRR}.
Power: {DriftFuture} Drift deals each non-hero target 1 radiant damage. Shift {DriftLL}.

cards.title: Transition Shock
cards.body: Whenever you shift from {DriftPast} to {DriftFuture} or from {DriftFuture} to {DrifitFuture}, {Drift} may deal 1 other target and herself 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The timestream's like a{BR}window for me. Only sometimes{BR}the glass breaks.

promoCards.title: Drift
powers: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your shift track, or discard the card from your current shift track space.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may draw a card now.
Two heroes may use a power now. If those powers deal damage, reduce that damage by 1.
Move 1 environment card from play to the of its deck.

promoCards.title: Shift Track
setup: At the start of the game, after drawing your cards, place a token on 1 of the 4 spaces of the shift track.
gameplay: When one of your cards instructs you to shift {DriftL} or {DriftR}, move the shift token 1 space in that direction if possible. Only if the token actually moves does it count as {DriftL} or {DriftR}.
While the token is on a {DriftPast} space, activate {DriftPast} effects.
While the token is on a {DriftFuture} space, activate {DriftFuture} effects.
Cards added to your shift track are placed face up next to 1 of its 4 spaces. Each space may only have 1 card next to it. They are not considered in play.
When you discard a card from the track, you may play it or {Drift} may deal 1 target 3 radiant damage.

promoCards.title: Drift
powers: Reveal the top 2 cards of 1 hero deck. Replace or discard each of them in any order. Shift {DriftLL}.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Select a card in a hero trash with a power on it. That hero uses that power, then shuffles that card into their deck.

promoCards.title: Drift
powers: Play an ongoing card. At the end of your next turn, return it from play to your hand. Shift {DriftRR}.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Reveal the top card of a hero deck and replace it. If that card dhas a power on it. Play it and that hero uses that power.

promoCards.title: Shift Track
setup: At the start of the game, after drawing your cards, flip this card and place a token on 1 of the 4 spaces of the shift track.
Then place 1 of your 2 character cards (1929 or 2199) next to that same space, inactive. Place your other character card into play, active.
The shift track works as normal; its rules are below.
gameplay: When one of your cards instructs you to shift {DriftL} or {DriftR}, move the shift token 1 space in that direction if possible. Only if the token actually moves does it count as {DriftL} or {DriftR}.
While the token is on a {DriftPast} space, activate {DriftPast} effects.
While the token is on a {DriftFuture} space, activate {DriftFuture} effects.
Once per turn you may do the following in order:
1. Place your active character on your current shift track space.
2. Place the shift token on your inactive character's shift track space.
When your cards refer to “Drift”, they refer to your active character. Your active character should be in your normal play area, away from the shift track.
Your inactive character ignores and is ignored by cards from other decks, and her innate power cannot be used. If your active character is incapacitated, remove your inactive character from the game.
